CRAI, CRA II & SCRAs required in  Ekaterinburg by Global TOP10 CRO & Pharma Companies

About i-Pharm Consulting

i-Pharm Consulting is a specialist recruitment company focused on mid to high-level roles in Clinical Research & Medical Affairs. We recruit for both permanent and contract staff in Russia and across Europe. Our clients include Pharmaceutical, Biotechnology, Contract Research and Medical Device companies. Click on the link for more information:

www.i-pharmconsulting.com

JOB SUMMARY

Are you a CRA looking for next stage in your career development? Major Global Top 10 CRO and Pharma Companies require CRAI, CRA IIs and SCRA(minimum of 6 months monitoring experience in  Russia  required) as part of exciting ongoing expansion. You can be home or office based.

Background (Company)

Be part of the continuing success of a major international CRO and Pharma Companies.

Key Responsibilities

Clinical monitoring of Phase I-IV clinical trials across a range of core therapeutic areas as well as start-up and close-out activities

Management of clinical study site activities to ensure the integrity of   clinical data

May assume role of Lead CRA on assigned projects

Provide support and mentoring to more junior CRAs

Benefits:

Competitive salary

Car Allowance

Private Healthcare

Life Insurance

Flexible working arrangements (possible  home  based)

Qualifications

Life sciences degree OR relevant nursing   qualification

Russia based clinical monitoring experience

ICH-GCP

Ability to work independently

Fluency in English & Russian

The right to work in Russia

To Apply

If you would like to discuss this vacancy further, please call Radek Weichert on +44 (0)20 3189 0470, or email rweichert@i-pharmconsulting.com. If this role is not suitable, Radek will happily discuss other possible positions or answer any general questions regarding your career and the current market.
